quote: Be here now.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: When the mind is still, the universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Less is more.
author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: To follow the path, look to the master, follow the master, walk with the master, see through the master, become the master.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Let go or be dragged.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Chop wood, carry water.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Before enlightenment, chop wood, carry water. After enlightenment, chop wood, carry water.
author: Zen Saying

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The obstacle is the path.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: To know yourself is to forget yourself.
author: Zen Saying

quote: Empty your cup so that it may be filled.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray

quote: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: Act without expectation.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When walking, walk. When eating, eat.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Zen is not some kind of excitement, but concentration on our usual everyday routine.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: Rain does not fall on one roof alone.
author: Zen Saying

quote: Flow with whatever may happen.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes, and the grass grows by itself.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Be like water.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The moon does not fight. It attacks no one. It does not worry. It does not try to crush others. It keeps to its course, but by its very nature, it gently influences.
author: Buddha

quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
author: Buddha

quote: Wherever you are, be there totally.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: Sitting silently, doing nothing, spring comes, and the grass grows by itself.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: When you let go of what you are, you become what you might be.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be present above all else.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: No way to the truth, the truth is the way.
author: Buddha

quote: The mind is a wonderful servant but a terrible master.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: Not knowing is most intimate.
author: Tao Te Ching

quote: True love is born from understanding.
author: Buddha

quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you want to climb a mountain, begin at the top.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.
author: Zen Saying

quote: The greatest effort is not concerned with results.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: To have a mind that is not rigid is to be free.
author: Shunryu Suzuki

quote: The way out is through the door.
author: Zen Saying

quote: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
author: Buddha

quote: Everything that has a beginning has an ending.
author: Buddha

quote: Don’t seek, don’t search, don’t ask, don’t knock, don’t demand – relax.
author: Osho

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you want to be Zen, be Zen now.
author: Zen Saying

quote: To follow the way, follow the moment.
author: Zen Proverb
